text: Maybelline New York, trading as Maybelline, is an American multinational cosmetics, skin care, perfume, and personal care company, based in New York City. It was founded in Chicago in 1915 and has been a subsidiary of French cosmetics company L'Or√©al since 1996. == Other websites == * Official website Category:Cosmetics Category:Companies based in New York City Category:1915 establishments in the United States Category:1910s establishments in Illinois
